summary: Tested new Interactive Learning Path features including backend module refactoring. Fixed route ordering bug for /api/learning-path/all-progress endpoint. All 25 backend tests pass. Frontend interactive features (course completion, save courses, progress tracking) working correctly.
passed_tests: test_course_progress_get_requires_auth - Auth required for GET course progress
test_get_course_progress_success - GET course progress returns stats
test_saved_courses_requires_auth - Auth required for saved courses
test_save_course_success - Save course to profile works
test_get_saved_courses - GET saved courses returns list
test_get_all_progress - GET all learning paths progress works
critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: Route ordering bug - /api/learning-path/all-progress was being matched by /{path_id}/course-progress. Moved all-progress route before parameterized routes.
New module structure verified: config.py, database.py, auth.py, models/, services/, routes/
Interactive learning path features working: course completion tracking, save courses, progress stats
Frontend LearningPathPage.js has all required data-testid attributes for testing
updated_files: /app/tests/test_interactive_learning_path.py - New test file for interactive features
seed_data_creation: Test courses created with TEST_ prefix and cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Interactive Learning Path features fully implemented and tested. New endpoints: POST/GET /api/learning-path/{path_id}/course-progress (mark courses complete), POST/GET/DELETE /api/user/saved-courses (save courses to profile), GET /api/learning-path/all-progress (summary of all paths). Backend refactored with new module structure (config.py, database.py, auth.py, models/, services/). Route ordering was fixed - static routes must come before parameterized routes in FastAPI.

mocked_apis.note: Paddle Payments - entire monetization flow is MOCKED

course_progress_tracking.details: POST/GET /api/learning-path/{path_id}/course-progress - mark individual courses complete, get progress stats

saved_courses.details: POST/GET/DELETE /api/user/saved-courses - save courses to profile, retrieve, delete

all_progress_summary.details: GET /api/learning-path/all-progress - returns summary for all user's learning paths

frontend_interactive_features.details: Course completion checkboxes, save course buttons, progress stats display, expand/collapse weeks

module_structure.details: config.py, database.py, auth.py, models/, services/ all properly structured and importable
